airlineNameRuleResponse.alMsg: As per Vistara's policy, in case you don't have a last name, your first name will be added as your last name.
airlineNameRuleResponse.cnfmMsg: We have made the necessary changes for you.

airlineNameRuleResponse.alMsg: As per Emirates' policy, in case you don't have a last name, a title will be added as your first name, and your first name will be added as your last name.
airlineNameRuleResponse.cnfmMsg: We have made the necessary changes for you.
